com.yy.cs.base.redis

类 RedisClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool.Config
      • redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig
        • com.yy.cs.base.redis.RedisClientFactory

  • public class RedisClientFactory
extends redis.clients.jedis.JedisPoolConfig
    管理redis的连接池工厂类，redis连接的参数设置

        public redis.clients.jedis.JedisPool getSlavePool()
